content: Just got the news - our DeFi project is in the hackathon! Time to ramp up development and prepare for the pitch. This could be big.
Spent the day refining my talk for the conference. Added insights on how AI can democratize trading or concentrate power. It's a balancing act.
Just finished a heart-to-heart with my mentor. He's guiding me on how to present my work with both technical prowess and ethical considerations. Feels like I'm leveling up.
